Brian Maier Jr.

designer / developer

Hello, I'm Brian! I'm a designer/front-end devevloper that adheres to simplicity and usability. I also love well-done type and hand-lettering.

It's true. I am able to craft amazing creations digitally using the many tricks and tools that I have discoverd throughout the past 5+ years. If you would like to see some examples you can email me or check out what I am working on now here.
